name: Vertex to Rect

inputs.name: Top left
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of the rectangle's top left corner

inputs.name: Top right
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of the rectangle's top right corner

inputs.name: Bottom left
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of the rectangle's bottom left corner

inputs.name: Bottom right
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of the rectangle's bottom right corner

description: Create a rectangle by specifying its 4 corners positions.
